Text: British Grand Prix:  The British and Italian Grands Prix are the only Formula One World Championship Grands Prix staged continuously since the championship was introduced in 1950 (the Monaco and Belgian Grands Prix have missed a few seasons since hosting races in the 1950 inaugural season).
